text: Eghtɨ namba 7ɨn azenimɨn ia nguazim ateghtɨ an avughsɨ pura ikɨ. Egh ia an otivir dagheba inian markɨ. Nɨ uaghan arazir kamra wainɨn azenim ko olivɨn azenim damu. Eghtɨ biziba puvatɨzir gumazamizibara, azenir kabar dagheba iniam. Egh gumazir biziba puvatɨziba, me dagher naba ateghtɨma, asɨzir atiaba dagher kabar amɨ da gɨvagham.
